settings.heading: How does it work?
settings.text: When you are exposed to cold water, your blood vessels constrict and get smaller. And when you get out of the water, the change in temperature causes them to rapidly re-open, which can help to flush the muscles' metabolic waste products.

settings.heading: Recover faster, mind and soul.
settings.text: Learn the art of the stoic, find stillness in the chaos and learn to control your mind better than ever before. Ice baths give you the power to take back control of your body and and mind.

settings.title: How do I keep the water clean?
settings.text:
We recommend changing the water once per week without any additives. If you'd like the water to last longer, we suggest bromine tablets or powder, which should extend the usable time up to 1 month. Bromine is more skin-friendly and lasts longer than chlorine in cold water and you'll need very little to be effective.

When you drain the water from your Pod, to extend the life of your next fill, we recommend washing the inside surfaces with warm soapy water.

settings.title: I am 6ft2 will I fit?
settings.text: We've designed our bath to fit all sizes up to 2.1m tall (6' 7"), whilst minimising water and cooling requirements.

settings.title: How easy is it to fill up?
settings.text: Super easy! Simply use a hose pipe or a bucket / container and add room temperature water. Once filled to approximately 70% full, you'll be ready for your first dip! Later, we recommend adding ice or ice packs to reduce the temperature further. Our Pods are insulated top, bottom and sides, so will maintain the water temperature for longer than you'd expect!

settings.title: Does it come with a lid?
settings.text: Yes! During the November pre-order, our Summer Lid is included with all orders. We are currently redesigning our Winter Lid and will contact all pre-orders with a special discount when ready.

settings.title: How does it stay cold?
settings.text: Our Pod integrates a triple layer insulation system and a thermo lid to lengthen the time at a given temperature. We recommend deploying your Pod outside under shade to maximise the passive overnight cooling effect and then adding ice or ice blocks as needed.

settings.title: How do you clean it?
settings.text: This is one reason we love the Portable Pod, simply empty using the drain tap and the included 75 cm extendable drain hose, then wipe down with any regular household cleaning product and rinse out. There's no need to leave it to dry, you can start filling your Pod immediately after.

settings.title: How portable is it when packed down?
settings.text: The Pod packs down into a small briefcase shaped box, with an included carry handle with dimensions 68 x 36 x 11 cm and total weight of 3.5 kg.
